originalText.text: Ultra high premiums and coverage that is abysmal.  So many exclusions as to make your policy worthless to you should you have a claim.  They also underwrite so as to make a profit off of every policy.  Pay off the thing by any means instead of giving these people money for a worthless insurance product.

originalText.text:
NEVER paid for my collapsed ceilings. CHUBB and Sons is the BIGGEST scam. . â€¦.Just read hundreds of their reviews with the biggest run around to avoid any payments.  There should be a class action LAWSUIT!!!!

To top it all, they paid their sleazy lawyer (who shut down his former bossâ€™s firm and gave away a partner's client base) to change a legal caption in my case  to prevent me from filing an appeal after arguing that the process server did not do the right job. (I asked them to have it corrected 3 times). FRAUDSTERS. Would OVERSPEND on lawyers then actually cover the claims.

When I requested they provide contact information to their underwriter so that I can be compensated for damages, they refused insisting I cite authorities before they reconsider. A great way to deter anyone from pursuing their claims.

Report them to your local authorities!!!!!

originalText.text: Chubb takes zero responsibility with customer relations . They claimed to have sent via US mail , during Christmas season 2017  a notice to my home, concerning an expired debit card which had been used for three straight years to make payments. No letter was ever received. In contacting Chubb to straighten this situation , the response I received was, you only carry home insurance with us and unless you add your car insurance , we chose not to renew your home insurance policy. The reason I would not take out car insurance  policy with Chubb,  was because Geico was and is three times less expensive .
